medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Diffuse abdominal pain started 3 days ago and today localized to the right lower quadrant. There is some decrease in appetite but no fevers, chills, nausea, vomiting, constipation, diarrhea, melena, hematochezia, dysuria, or frequency.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, epididymitis treated with Levaquin for 7 days, depression, obstructive sleep apnea on BiPAP, left open reduction and internal fixation of humerus fracture.
medical_history.family_history: No history of Crohn's disease or ulcerative colitis.
